name: Bike Race Drag
description:
Here we come with our new fun and free challenging bike race drag game where you can do stunts.
This game is for adventure rider where craziness has no limit and bike can perform stunt with madness.
Biker will climb on downhill with mad obstacle to reach the finishing line he will have accelerator , break , back and front control.

biker will get tips by playing this thrill hill run game.

How to Play
=> Touch front arrow buttons to lean forward or move front.
=> Use brakes to make balance on hill and back button to maintain balance.

Features
=> 40 + Different and amazing levels to drag your bike.
=> Choose bike of your choice with different powers
=> Hill climb racer with drag,
=> Make stylish stunts

Enjoy Free Bike Race Drag Game!!!!
